mapper.insert: insert into ridingReply(ridingNo, nickname, ridingReplyComent) values (#{ridingNo}, #{nickname}, #{ridingReplyComent})
mapper.update: update ridingReply set ridingReplyComent=#{ridingReplyComent} where ridingReplyNo=${ridingReplyNo} and nickname=#{nickname}
mapper.delete: delete from ridingReply where ridingReplyNo=#{param1} and nickname=#{param2}
